title: NHS UK Jobs Scraper
description: Extract job listings from NHS Jobs UK. Search by keyword, location, contract type, and more. Automatically tries JSON API first, then falls back to HTML parsing for maximum reliability.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Start from a specific NHS Jobs search URL. If provided, this overrides all search parameters.

keyword.title: Job Keyword
keyword.description: Search for jobs by title, skill, or keyword (e.g., 'Nurse', 'Doctor', 'Administrator').

location.title: Location
location.description: Search for jobs in a specific location (city, town, or postcode).

distance.title: Distance (miles)
distance.description: Search radius in miles from the location (e.g., '5', '10', '20').

staffGroup.title: Staff Group
staffGroup.description: Filter by NHS staff group (e.g., 'Nursing and Midwifery', 'Medical and Dental').

payRange.title: Pay Range
payRange.description: Filter by salary range or NHS pay band.

collectDetails.title: Collect Full Job Details
collectDetails.description: Enable to visit each job page and extract complete descriptions. Disable for faster scraping with basic info only.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Results
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of jobs to extract. Leave empty or set high for unlimited.

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages
max_pages.description: Safety limit on number of search result pages to process.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Configure proxy settings. Residential proxies recommended for best results.
